greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A134664(n) mod 2.
comment: It would be nice to have an alternative characterization of this sequence.
link: M. Elder and V. Vatter, Problems and Conjectures presented at the Third International Conference on Permutation Patterns, University of Florida, March 7-11, 2005, arXiv:math/0505504 [math.CO], 2005.
example: There are 114 3-stack-sortable permutations of {1,2,3,4,5}. Since 114 is even, a(5)=0.
results.author: _Colin Defant_, Mar 18 2019
